terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to FlyTravel. By using our website and services, you agree to these terms.
terms.s1Body: We provide travel booking and related services. All bookings are subject to availability and our partner terms.
terms.s2Body: Prices are in USD unless stated otherwise. Payment terms will be communicated at the time of booking.
terms.s3Body: Cancellation policies vary by package. Please refer to your booking confirmation or contact us for details.
terms.s4Body: For questions about these terms, contact us at info@flytravel.com.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: FlyTravel respects your privacy. This policy describes how we collect and use your information.
privacy.s1Body: We collect information you provide when booking, contacting us, or subscribing to our newsletter (name, email, phone, and message content).
privacy.s2Body: We use your information to process bookings, respond to inquiries, send updates and offers (if you subscribed), and improve our services.
privacy.s3Body: We do not sell your data. We may share information with travel partners only as needed to fulfill your booking.
privacy.s4Body: For privacy requests or questions, contact us at info@flytravel.com.
